# Preprocessing Steps

This page describes the data cleaning and preparation steps performed before analysis.

---

## 1. Missing Values

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(readr)
skaters <- read_csv("D:/GMU homeworks/STAT515/final proj/skaters.csv", guess_max = 20000)
colSums(is.na(skaters))
```

## 2.Convert Character â†’ Numeric Where Needed
```{r}
skaters_clean <- skaters %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), ~ suppressWarnings(as.numeric(.))))

```

## 3. Remove Impossible or Negative Values
```{r}
skaters_clean <- skaters_clean %>%
filter(shifts >= 0)

```


## 4. Save Clean Version for Analysis
```{r}
skaters <- skaters_clean
```
